mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed,contents,A.location,A.created_at AS createdAt ,B.iuser AS writerIuser,B.nm AS writerNm,B.pic AS writerPic, if(C.iuser IS NULL,0,1) AS isFav, C.iuser FROM t_feed AS A JOIN t_user AS B ON A.iuser=B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav AS C ON A.ifeed=C.ifeed AND C.iuser=#{loginedIuser} ORDER BY A.ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}
